name: test_e2e_with_logs[550_API_PROTO_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `API_PROTO_002` |
| **Name** | Prototype Pollution via Constructor |
| **Category** | API_SECURITY |
| **Subcategory** | prototype_pollution |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `{"constructor":{"prototype":{"isAdmin":true}}}`
- **Encoded**: `%7B%22constructor%22%3A%7B%22prototype%22%3A%7B%22isAdmin%22%3Atrue%7D%7D%7D`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~26000ms
- **Timestamp**: 09:06:16.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX API Attack] API security vulnerability detected` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX API Attack] API security vulnerability detected test_id=API_PROTO_002-1771059976580-a08x6m pattern_id=API_PROTO_002 uri=/?q=%7B%22constructor%22%3A%7B%22prototype%22%3A%7B%22isAdmin%22%3Atrue%7D%7D%7D client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
